game.name: Crush Crush
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 앱 내 구매, 통계, Steam 순위표, Remote Play 휴대전화, Remote Play 태블릿
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Crush Crush - the Idle Dating Sim! Meet, flirt, and fall in love with a motley cast of girls in this heartfelt and hilarious game.
